sentence.Network_en: They had nursed Peter back to some semblance of health.
sentence.Network_cn: 在他们的照料下，彼得貌似恢复了健康。

sentence.Network_en: The ceasefire brought about a semblance of peace.
sentence.Network_cn: 停火协定带来了表面的和平。

sentence.Network_en: He tried to restore some semblance of normality to their home life.
sentence.Network_cn: 他力图使他们的家庭生活恢复正常.

list.abs: 他年轻，身负重任（committed），一个仪表堂堂（magnificent semblance）的生命。罗杰。
all semblance of a centrel government disappeared .一个中央政府的一切外表就消失了。

But many of them do so without a semblance of a business plan ., 但是其中很多公司都没有一个表面的商业计划.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French, from sembler 'seem', from Latin similare, simulare 'simulate'

entry.def: If there is a semblance of a particular condition or quality, it appears to exist, even though this may be a false impression.

example.ex: At least a semblance of normality has been restored to parts of the country...
example.tran: 该国的部分地区至少已经恢复了表面的常态。

example.ex: They had nursed Peter back to some semblance of health.
example.tran: 在他们的照料下，彼得貌似恢复了健康。

means.word_mean: 1. an outward or token appearance or form that is deliberately misleading;

sentences.sentence: "he hoped his claims would have a semblance of authenticity"
"he tried to give his falsehood the gloss of moral sanction"
"the situation soon took on a different color"

means.word_mean: 3. picture consisting of a graphic image of a person or thing

auth_sentence.content: I kept up the semblance of a perfectly false cheer.
auth_sentence.res_content: I kept up the semblance of a perfectly false cheer.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I kept up the semblance of a perfectly false cheer.

auth_sentence.content: Thus maintaining a semblance of balance in the Middle East.
auth_sentence.res_content: Thus maintaining a semblance of balance in the Middle East.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Thus maintaining a semblance of balance in the Middle East.

auth_sentence.content: Over time, a semblance of normalcy returned.
auth_sentence.res_content: Over time, a semblance of normalcy returned.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Over time, a semblance of normalcy returned.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 集合, 装配, 集会, 集结, 汇编
stems_affixes.word_buile: assemble[v.集合,召集;装配;收集 v.集合,聚集]+y状态,性质→assembly
resemble[v.像,类似]+ance表名词→n.相似,相似性[点,物]
sembl相类似,一样+ance表名词→相同之处
as不断+sembl相类似,一样+e→不断[走向]同一个地方→召集
dis不+sembl相类似,一样+e→不想同装做相同→掩饰
re再,加强+sembl相类似,一样+e→v.像,类似

sentences.en: Her semblance of anger frightened the children.
sentences.cn: 她生气的样子使孩子们感到害怕。
